artifact_name: scribal palette; pigment sample; reed pen
Description: Part of a rectangular wooden scribal palette with 2 oval wells in form of cartouches containing red and black pigment(drill hole in one); groove for pens with bridge in centre, lid missing; contains 5 reed pens.
Curator's comments: Published: Kitchen, Ram. Insc. Vol 3 p. 249. PM I Part 2: p.844. Published: Glanville, S.R.K., JEA Vol.18, 1932, p. 59, pl. VII,1.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Sir John Gardner Wilkinson
